[DQC.US.0004.9286] Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect with a value of 12,490,000 is not equal to the combined total of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities and Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities ( 37,551,000 + -8,229,000 + -16,723,000 ) with a value of 12,599,000.
These values should be equal.
